subject: Miles here
body:
This is what you are looking for. Call for infomation on how you can generate up to 3k each and every day of the week. Dial this number for details.

Oh the sun is shining and things are better each day.

I get to stay home and relax on my porch while I simply return phone calls
each day. This can be you also if you want it to be.

The potential to generate up to $3OOO each week is there
so pick up that telephone and call my information line.

800-472-9246




Get back to me via Lester6Lester@commonsmedical.com if not lnterested





Calvin: People think it must be fun to be a super genius, but they don't realize how hard it is to put up with all the idiots in the world.
